column4: I'm running karmic and I can't copy and paste between several applications.   It seems that selecting text in Konsole just doesn't bother putting it in the clipboard, even when I do Edit -> Copy from the menu.  Any thoughts?
Konsole is kde right?, might be that
just select and then middle mouse, or shift+insert, should be generally working
Yes, I know how to copy/paste.   It's just Konsole that's affected.
